name: ESTHER LISENE
wishText: May Almight God always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy Ausi a moholo
text2: That's what you will receive today from our friends and beloved ones.
text3: Neke tlo choo jwalo le nna mare hee.. ka nka nako ke nahna mare hoja birthday cards nele litla fihla ka nako. neke tla e senda empa ke lula khakala Ahhhhhhh..
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: We were once in a relationship
outroText: Happy birthday! Your special day is a chance to reflect on the beautiful moments and look forward to the wonderful things yet to come. Wishing you a year of growth, happiness, and fulfilling experiences.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.Enjoy your Day MPOLOKENG many more years
